remarks: Alternate predicate for "is a closed projective subspace".  Remark in [Holland95] p. 223.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pmapsubcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapsubcl.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapsubcl.c $e |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
ispsubcl2N $p |- ( K e. HL -> ( X e. C <-> E. y e. B X = ( M ` y ) ) ) $.
$d B y $.
$d K y $.
$d M y $.
$d X y $.
